entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
